user_instruction: 'Send out the latest update about the school life at our childcare center to the parents'"'"' group (parents@sunnydayschildcare.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Could you please prepare and send our latest school-life update to parents?

Hi [Colleague’s Name],

I hope you’re well. Could you kindly pull the most recent notes, photos, and highlights from Jane’s “Sunny Days Childcare – Weekly Updates” page on Notion and draft an email to parents@sunnydayschildcare.com? Please include:

• A brief recap of classroom activities and any milestones from this week  
• Reminders about upcoming events or deadlines (field trip forms, parent conferences, etc.)  
• A short preview of next week’s planned themes or lessons  
• Any photos or artwork Jane has flagged for sharing (with first names only)  

Once drafted, send it out to the parents’ list and copy Jane for reference. If you need clarification, feel free to check the shared calendar or ping me.

Thank you so much for your help!

Best,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
